mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.XZJG_QZ as "xzjgQz" , a.XZJG_DZ as "xzjgDz" , a.JXDW_QZ as "jxdwQz" , a.JXDW_DZ as "jxdwDz" , a.KYDW_QZ as "kydwQz" , a.KYDW_DZ as "kydwDz" , a.JFDW_QZ as "jfdwQz" , a.JFDW_DZ as "jfdwDz" , a.QTZZ_QZ as "qtzzQz" , a.QTZZ_DZ as "qtzzDz" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM T_SYS_ZZJGBMGZ a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_ZZJGBMGZ( ID , XZJG_QZ , XZJG_DZ , JXDW_QZ , JXDW_DZ , KYDW_QZ , KYDW_DZ , JFDW_QZ , JFDW_DZ , QTZZ_QZ , QTZZ_DZ , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{xzjgQz} , #{xzjgDz} , #{jxdwQz} , #{jxdwDz} , #{kydwQz} , #{kydwDz} , #{jfdwQz} , #{jfdwDz} , #{qtzzQz} , #{qtzzDz} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
